name: Ravello Systems
overview:
Ravello is the industry’s first “cloud application platform.”

This unique infrastructure allows enterprises to take any application and run it in any cloud without any modifications whatsoever. For example, enterprises can take an entire multi-VM application running on VMware infrastructure in their data center - with multiple switches, routers, and firewalls - and run that on AWS (which is Xen-based), without any changes. This easy approach facilitates seamless bursting to the cloud, disaster recovery and other on-demand use-cases that are ideal for the cloud.
